longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for the period of intended stay.
- British passports endorsed  British Citizen  that have been
  extended 12 months by an extension stamp contained within
  the passport are accepted.

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 60 days:
 - for holders of British passports endorsed  British
   Citizen . 
Visa Issuance:
Visa required, except for Holders of British passports
endorsed  British Citizen  can obtain a visa on arrival for a
stay of more than 60 days. Fee: varies between USD 40.- and
USD 100.-
vaccination:
Vaccinations not required.

Recommended:
- Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, exclusively due to P.
  vivax, exists from June through October in areas bordering
  Tajikistan and Uzbekistan (Batken, Jalal-Abad and Osh
  regions) and in the outskirts of Bishkek. Recommended
  prevention: A.
